entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who is being sent on a mission by Dumbledore. He is described as the black dog and is tasked with alerting Remus Lupin, Arabella Figg, and Mundungus Fletcher.

entities.name: remus lupin
entities.description: Remus Lupin is a person who needs to be alerted by Sirius. He is part of the old crowd that Sirius will contact.

entities.name: arabella figg
entities.description: Arabella Figg is a person who needs to be alerted by Sirius. She is part of the old crowd that Sirius will contact.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is a person who needs to be alerted by Sirius. He is part of the old crowd that Sirius will contact.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is sending Sirius on a mission. He asks Snape to do something but it is not specified what.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is asked by Dumbledore to do something but it is not specified what.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who does not want Sirius to leave. He wants him to stay.

relationships.description: Sirius will alert Remus Lupin as part of his mission.
Sirius will alert Arabella Figg as part of his mission.
Sirius will alert Mundungus Fletcher as part of his mission.
Dumbledore asks Snape to do something but it is not specified what.
Sirius said goodbye to Harry before leaving.
